评论概述: Top rolls up if you've your arms more than an inch.

It’s very loose around the waist and trying to just used safety pins and ribbons to tighten it not only looks bad but results in so many snags like an unreasonable amount considering the material. Sleeves aren't like photo they are very short and neck is weirdly fitting sewn a weird way... Been looking forward to this for months :(

Cute and all and comfy, top doesn't stay folded down at all.

A little big but its very comfortable to wear!

my only complaint is that the small is still pretty big, i wish there was an extra small! for reference im 120lbs and 5’4. I bought a medium cause I mean that’s what I usually am but girllllll I needed and XTRA small this thing felt like it was supposed to be maternity.if your gonna order order WAY smaller or just buy something better…..

it looks exactly like the picture it’s baggy chic very cute but it bunches in the stomach area which isn’t super flattering but could be fixed with a corset or the ribbon trick the fabric is super soft it pretty light the shoulder part does roll up a little however a couple of stitches and it holds fine
the dress is very comfortable and soft but the fold over part on the top curls up. that was the only issue i saw with this product.

评论概述: Super Comfortable, Trouble with Shoulder Sticking
评论详情: This sweater is super super comfy and fots very well. It's got a nice weight to it without it feeling suffocating (which is nice since some of the lighter ones feel like they'd rip with one wrong move). The only issue I had was the neck/shoulder cowling that it shows in the photo. It doesn't stay on your shoulders, but instead wants to roll up around your collarbone. I just bought some fabric tape to keep them in place and it works fine.

Fits pretty well, the collar is just a bit weird. The material isn’t bad, fairly soft and stretchy but a bit itchy. My only real complaint, it smelled really bad; straight out of the package. Updated-Wore it 1 time, did not even get through an entire day and not One, not Two, but Three holes have came about. The material just started unraveling. Very upset that I spent $30 on this, trash.
It is so cute but the shoulder often rolled up, like the all off the shoulder top. But I don't mind, my mom helped me pin it up lol
